## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>MUSE3, UFD2</u>
- **Gene Name:** Mutant, snc1 -enhancing 3, r Ubiquitin Fusion Degradation Protein2
- **Description:**   U-box domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)

- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
